name: Christmas at the Overlook
description:
Have you ever wondered what happened to Jack Torrance at the end of the horror classic, 'The Shining'?

Have you ever wanted to beat the famous Overlook Maze?

Now you can! Return to the Overlook Hotel and discover what occurs there at this festive time of year! Enjoy an exact recreation of the famous Overlook maze! 

***************************************************

Made in three days as part of the Game Dev Unlocked,  'Winter' themed game jam.

***************************************************

The Shining - Main Title Cover by Kevin Bias.

https://kevinbias.bandcamp.com 

Written by Wendy Carlos & Rachel Elkind
